content.text: Mantras of Self-Compassion: If you notice your mind is speaking harshly to you or trauma-activated, return to these powerful phrases. Say to yourself, as many times as necessary.

items.text: I'm always allowed to be kind and supportive to myself.
At the time, I did my best.
I treat myself with the same compassion & kindness I offer others.

content.text: Think of a situation in your life that is causing confusion or unease.

items.text: What is the truth of this situation?
Are you seeing clearly, or are you getting lost in judgment, taking things personally, in stories you're telling yourself, or repeating past messages you've internalized? How?
Is your vision clouded by greed, hatred, confusion, clinging, attachment, or craving? How?

content.text: In what situations and parts of your life do you have the most difficulty separating desire from need?
List 1-3 admirable action(s) you took this week (whether in self-care or in service to others.)
